title: Drawing, Design for Mahogany Inlay Writing Table for George M. Nowell, 1900–05
title_raw: Design for Mahogany Inlay Writing Table for George M. Nowell
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, upper left quadrant: Geo M. Nowell / 1 M. & Inlay Writing Table / Reg. Stock / Pattern; below design, lower right: use inlay ornaments as before; across table top: Handsome wood top [underlined]; inside design at right and center left of design, with arrows pointing to central panel: Lock; inlay
creditline: Gift of The Lake St. Louis Historical Society
description: Semi-circular table top with backsplash and inlaid central front panel flanked by 2 drawers on either side; raised on 4 straight tapering legs terminating in tapering feet.

participants.person_name: The Lake St. Louis Historical Society

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, Design for Mahogany Inlay Writing Table for George M. Nowell, 1900–05. Graphite on thin cream paper. 
Gift of The Lake St. Louis Historical Society. 2000-69-236
